casebody.data:
STATE of Indiana BOARD OF FIREFIGHTING AND PERSONNEL STANDARDS, Appellant,
v.
John T. CLINE, Appellee. Court of Appeals Case No. 49A04-1707-PL-1670 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed January 17, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

BAILEY , J.

Reversed.

PYLE, J., Concurs.

KIRSCH, J., Concurs with separate opinion.
